Description: Papyrus; Hieratic oracular amuletic text on recto. Verso is inaccesible.
Curator's comments: The papyrus was mounted on paper so it is unclear whether the verso contains any text. Published in I. E. S. Edwards, Oracular Amuletic Decrees of the Late New Kingdom (HPBM 4; London: British Museum 1960).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381197) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381197)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fragmentary, fractured, bloom Black ink Backed: white paper Supported locally: gelatin Supported overall: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: fair
